text: Andrzej Sapkowski (born June 21, 1948 in Łódź) is a Polish fantasy writer. His best known work is The Witcher (Wiedźmin) Saga (takes place in a fictional universe). Before starting his career in the late 1980s, he worked in foreign trade. Category:Polish writers Category:1948 births Category:Living people
title: Andrzej Sapkowski
